section.title: GreaterThan
section.para: Zend\Validator\GreaterThan allows you to validate if a given value is greater than a minimum border value.

note.title: Zend\Validator\GreaterThan supports only number validation
note.para: It should be noted that Zend\Validator\GreaterThan supports only the validation of numbers. Strings or dates can not be validated with this validator.

section.title: Supported options for Zend\Validator\GreaterThan
section.para: The following options are supported for Zend\Validator\GreaterThan:

listitem.para: inclusive: Defines if the validation is inclusive the minimum border value or exclusive. It defaults to FALSE.
min: Sets the minimum allowed value.
